game.name: Euro Truck Driving Sim 2018 3D
game.description:
The most realistic racing game you have ever played has already been launched! Have you tried it yet or not? Join Euro Truck Driving Sim 2018 3D game and be prepared to become the king of the road! It is not going to be easy to drive on an ice road where multiple other vehicles are also there to decrease the speed of your truck. This brand new racing 4x4 off road game features plenty of euro trucks with customization option.

Take your seat on your chosen monster truck and get ready to drive it across multiple countries across the globe! You would also have an option to enjoy driving in low and high beam with a matchless Jake brake and cruise control. It is a wonderful opportunity here to take the full control on a heavy truck that can also move as fast as other vehicles do. Drive fast, collect fuels whenever you see along the road and complete your task to complete the level!

Each successful effort will reward you with some points through which you can purchase new truck models to make your next level more challenging and interesting in this HTML5 truck game. Your engagement in the gameplay will allow you to get a thrilling truck driving experience on the beautifully-designed off-road tracks. There are different breath-taking and death-defying landscapes and highways to drive your heavy truck. Use the map or GPS to take the route to race your vehicle on the road in this heavy euro truck simulator!
